name: PrehistorTIC
description:
STORY:

The verdict was clear: "Take him to the pit!"

And there you are: waiting for your death, because it's coming, for sure.

But how long can you stand avoiding those executioners falling rocks?

Try to survive as long as you can!

FEATURES:

  • Simple controls, LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys to move and Z to select
  • Cute pixel art
  • Unforgiving
  • No gore
  • 2 difficulty level (Normal and Hard) with highscores

Hope you'll enjoy your time with PrehistorTIC!
